attributes.action: instigate an enquiery into the activities of the University of Bedfordshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many allegations have been made (to the Prime Minister and others) about activities of senior staff at the University of Luton now called the University of Bedfordshire. We ask the prime minister, promptly, to call for a public enquiry on the many complaints that have been received so that any damage that this institution might make both to national economies and future prospects of its potential students be diminished and restoration made for the wrongs committed.
